snippet.title: Super Mario 74: Ten Years After [A Crossover of Super Mario 74 x Extreme Edition] RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
Here's a hack to celebrate the legacy of a classic in ROM hacking times. This isn't made by Lugmillord, but by a huge fan of his, such as I. Enjoy the nostalgia!

NEW UPDATE v1.74.1 --- Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PT-85G9Z6pkP7ef6vi1I7UQhmfBez73n/view?usp=sharing

This hack is available in English for now, but I don't mind a German & French version for region localizations. Feel free to make one of those and link to this video.

---

What is this about?
///
The idea is simple: both hacks are mashed together to create newer themes with the same levels. Explore another new world in the Lord Cinematic Lugmiverse and collect 155 stars! The difficulty curve starts out easy and then ramps up a little harder at the end. 

What encouraged you to make this?
///
This hack was in the works a little while before Lugmillord's BTS video, way more after the reveal of the PJ74 Redone project and while another hack I'm working on was underway. I just granted everybody's wishes by improving the most famous of the bunch for the better... and for the worse. The concept is much more convienient than pitiful kaizo edits based on EE, I can tell you that! Lugmillord himself, greenlighted the idea it as long as this reminds people of what SM74 and EE had become due to their popularity, and it aged well for these 10 years.

---

Follow Lugmillord, the creator of Super Mario 74, for making those awesome hacks.
Be sure to check out his recent hack as well, called "Lug's Delightful Dioramas"!

His channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/Lugmillord

---

::: Keep crashin'! :::

|| Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/lincrash 
|| The Big C: https://discord.gg/XewDxfH

---

♪ Background music: 

World of Goo Beginning - World of Goo 
Bob-omb Battlefield (Original Version) - Super Mario 64 x SilvaGunner
Mario's Ranks - Super Mario Kart

Music copyrighted by 2D Boys and Nintendo.
